item.description:
http://www.mfa.org/ex....

"Richard Avedon was one of the greatest image-makers of the twentieth century. He revolutionized fashion photography with his imaginative, spirited portrayals of the "good life‚Äù showing beautiful women wearing extraordinary clothes in irresistible settings, as well as memorable portrayals that are both elegant and reserved. "

We will meet at the State Street Corporation Fenway Entrance @ 6:20 NOT AT THE HUNTINGTON AVE ENTRANCE. Please be on time.

The museum is free on Wednesday nights. No additional tickets are required for the Avedon exhibit when entering with this group.
item.how_to_find_us: meet at the State Street Corporation Fenway Entrance
item.name: Richard Avedon at the MFA
